envCluster 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Apply clustering algorithms

Source: R/clusterings.R
make_clusters.Rd

Apply clustering algorithms

make_clusters(
  bio_df,
  env_df = NULL,
  methods_df = tibble(method = "average"),
  context,
  taxa_col = "taxa",
  num_col = NULL,
  env_cols,
  groups = 2:100,
  cores = 1,
  clust_col_in = "clust",
  clust_col_out = "cluster"
)

Arguments

bio_df

Dataframe. Needs the 'cols' outlined below.
env_df

Dataframe (wide) of environmental variables per sitecol.
methods_df

Dataframe. What methods to use to create clusters.
context

Character. Name of columns in bio_df that define the context.
taxa_col

Character. Name of column with taxa.
num_col

Character. Name of column with numeric data indicating relative abundance of taxa.
env_cols

Character. Name of columns in env_df that have the
groups

Numeric vector indicating the range of groups within a clustering.
cores

Numeric. Number of cores to use where parallel options exist.
clust_col_in

Character name of column of raw class labels.
clust_col_out

Character name of column of character class labels.

Value

Dataframe with groups and methods columns and a list column of the clustering for that number of groups and method as a tibble with one column (numeric) 'clust' indicating group membership.
